doc.title: Available variables
doc.page: : Musiyano ndicho chinhu cheURL chepeji yewebhu yazvino, ona
doc.pageHost: : The domain name of the current web page
doc.isSameSubDomain: {{_isSameSubDomain_}}: Zita redomeini rimwechete. Ziva kuti kunyange zvazvo mazita edomeini e{{_youtube_}} ne {{_families_}} ari ese {{_mainDomain_}}, mazita edomain ndeaya {{_youtubeSubDomain_}} uye {{ _familiesSubDomain_}} saka mazita avo akasiyana.
doc.minimatch: : {{_glob_}} nzira yekuenzanisa, uchishandisa {{_minimatch_}} raibhurari, nzira yekushandisa <a href='https://github.com/isaacs/minimatch' target='_blank' rel='noreferrer'>Ona < /a>, kana kuti unogona kutsvaga {{_glob_}}.
doc.isSameDomain: : Kana riri zita renzvimbo imwe chete, {{_true_}} ndihongu, {{_false_}} kwete.
doc.isSameParent: : Kunyangwe iri nzira yevabereki imwe chete, {{_true_}} ndihongu, {{_false_}} kwete.
doc.isPageSublink: : Ingave peji yazvino idiki relink yakadzvanywa, {{_true_}} hongu, {{_false_}} kwete.
doc.isPageMultilevelSublink: : Kunyangwe peji razvino riri peji diki risingaperi repanodzvanywa link, {{_true_}} hongu, {{_false_}} kwete.
doc.isClickSublink: : Kunyangwe link yadzvanywa iri sub-link yepeji razvino, {{_true_}} hongu, {{_false_}} kwete.
doc.isClickMultilevelSublink: : Kunyangwe iyo link yadzvanya iri sub-link isina muganhu yepeji razvino, {{_true_}} ndihongu, {{_false_}} kwete.

returnVariables.title: Returnable variables
returnVariables.rightTab: : Iyo link inovhura mune nyowani tab kurudyi
returnVariables.leftTab: : Iyo link inovhura mune nyowani tab kuruboshwe
